Body:
"""test that parenthesis are placed around string-embedded expressions."""
template = Template(
    """
            <%def name="bar(x, y)">
                ${x}
                ${y}
            </%def>

            <%self:bar x=" ${foo} " y="x${g and '1' or '2'}y"/>
        """
    , input_encoding='utf-8')
assert result_lines(template.render(foo='this is foo', g=False)) == [
    'this is foo', 'x2y']
